languages.text: This creature jumps toward the target and, upon landing, makes a powerful {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with its claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies. Any enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
languages.original_text: Jumps towards the target and delivers a powerful claw attack around. Enemies hit must succeed Reflex saving throw or become Proned

languages.text: Существо прыгает к цели и при приземлении совершает мощную {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} своими когтями, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках. Получив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, противники совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature jumps toward the target and, upon landing, makes a powerful {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with its claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies. Any enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Существо прыгает к цели и при приземлении совершает мощную {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} своими когтями, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках. Получив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, противники совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

Существо прыгает к цели и при приземлении совершает мощную {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} своими когтями, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках. Получив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, противники совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

languages.text: La criatura salta hacia el objetivo y, al aterrizar, lanza un poderoso {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} con sus garras, infligiendo {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes. Los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature jumps toward the target and, upon landing, makes a powerful {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with its claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies. Any enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La criatura salta hacia el objetivo y, al aterrizar, lanza un poderoso {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} con sus garras, infligiendo {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes. Los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.

languages.text: この生物はターゲットに向かってジャンプし、着地時にその爪で強力な{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行い、隣接するすべての敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: This creature jumps toward the target and, upon landing, makes a powerful {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with its claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies. Any enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物はターゲットに向かってジャンプし、着地時にその爪で強力な{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行い、隣接するすべての敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: 此生物跃向目标，落地后用巨大的利爪进行威力强大的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，对周围所有敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。所有被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: This creature jumps toward the target and, upon landing, makes a powerful {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with its claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies. Any enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物跃向目标，落地后用巨大的利爪进行威力强大的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，对周围所有敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。所有被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。

languages.text: Die Kreatur springt auf das Ziel zu und macht nach ihrer Landung einen mächtigen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} mit ihren Klauen, der allen benachbarten Gegnern {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Getroffene{/g} Gegner werden im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature jumps toward the target and, upon landing, makes a powerful {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with its claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies. Any enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Kreatur springt auf das Ziel zu und macht nach ihrer Landung einen mächtigen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} mit ihren Klauen, der allen benachbarten Gegnern {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Getroffene{/g} Gegner werden im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}.

languages.text: Cette créature saute en direction de la cible et, à l'atterrissage, exécute une puissante {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} avec ses griffes, infligeant des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} aux ennemis adjacents. Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.

Any enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
